info.name: Brick Planet Better Theme
info.description:
This is probably one of the first themes on BrickPlanet.

I am doing a large contribution to the website because this theme makes everything a lot better and could be edited to make more different themes.

This theme is not really good since it is my first theme I have done on Stylish, but it is the first; so the best currently.
info.additionalInfo:
V1.0 
- Created theme

V 1.1 
- Colour fixes

V 1.2 
- Made a lot of fixes to keep up with the new BrickPlanet updates and added gradients.

V 1.3
- Fixed Chat Colours being impossible to read.

V 1.4
- Made a lot of fixes of colours again, and removed gradients for buttons. 

V 1.5 
- Fixed the bug with the black box on the bottom of the screen and made loads of fixes such as fixing store being unusable.

V 1.6 
- Fixed loads of unreadable text and changed some colours.

V 1.7
- Did loads of fixes of colours.

EDIT: I AM UPDATING IT! I will update this because I am planning to return to BrickPlanet.
